name: Schiele's Ghost #003
description:
The Spanish flu terminated the young life of the Austrian painter Egon Schiele on October 31, 1918. 
The Corona-Pandemic brought the media artist s.myselle to life in 2021. Since November 2020 the artist, s.myselle, is collaborating with Martin Gasser and is training the works of Egon Schiele with machine learning in order to create a modern version of his art. Every piece is unique. 

On November 2nd, 2021 - All Souls Day - the artist will start minting NFTs for Schiele lovers. All pictures will be first sold as an NFT and later be exhibited in galleries. 

Schiele's Ghost Project: Presentations, Exhibitions until November 2nd, 2021  
September 2021: 
Graz/Austria: "Steirischer Herbst“ - Video Art Is Distant by  accomplices – Verein zur Erkundung multimedialer Ausdrucksformen
https://www.steirischerherbst.at/de/program/events/2057/accomplices-verein-zur-erkundung-multimedialer-ausdrucksformen

Oktober 2021: 
Düsseldorf/Germany "Die Digitale -  FAX2NFT" 
https://die-digitale.net/digital-jokes-die-grosse-kunstausstellung-im-weltkunstzimmer
https://fax2nft.com/
